name: Urls of Amazon categories
description: Enter urls of Amazon categories. You can also use specific product URLs directly.

name: Max items
description: Enter maximum number of items that can be scraped. Remember this actor gets maximum 50 items per URL.

name: Proxy configuration
description: Use proxy to avoid blocking. You can set proxy groups from specific countries to get region-specific results.

name: Detailed information
description: Check if you want to get more information to the individual products.

name: Debugging mode
description: Check if you want to display debug logs.
